sentences.sContent: Organic farmers should be encouraged with financial incentives.
sentences.sCn: 应对实行有机栽培的农民给予经济上的鼓励。

sentences.sContent: It was a wonderful film, but not exactly a financial success (= something that makes a profit ) .
sentences.sCn: 这是一部出色的影片，但在票房上不是很成功。

sentences.sContent: ...The retail giant said the poor financial performance this year has pushed it to begin implementing $400 million in cost-cutting measures...
...What is Martin Neil Baily's prediction about the financial situation in the future...
...But the president may be giving the financial sector too much credit: It was in a free fall，and it was a very scary period...
...is hard to determine with any precision—which is why governments and financial institutions are only beginning to bring such risks into their economic calculations...
...and they had the worst financial situation...
...She has a keen understanding of financial markets...
...Throughout the 2008 financial crisis and the recession and recovery that followed...

...universities are "catering to the social and educational needs of wealthy students at the expense of others" who won't enjoy the financial backing or social connections of richer students once they graduate...
...First-generation college students tend to have much heavier financial burdens than their peers...
...which are often known for robust financial aid packages and remarkably high graduation rates for first-generation students...

phrases.pCn: 经济援助；助学金；财政补助

words.tran: 筹措资金；财政管理；从事金融活动（finance的ing形式）
欺骗；从事欺骗性金融活动

trans.tranOther: relating to money or the management of money
